value:
$WmMPID_マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I've only been able to get this far
because I've had you by my side,
Caeda. I'd be lost without you.$k$p$WmMPID_シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I made you a promise when we left
Talys. I'll always be with you to offer
whatever aid I can—no matter what.$k$p$Sbs1000|
